title: Alder's Blood Prologue
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Role-playing (RPG), Role-playing (RPG), Role-playing (RPG), Role-playing (RPG), Role-playing (RPG)
description: Alder's Blood is a grim, dark and damp turn-based, tactical, strategic, 2D game. Lead a group of Hunters in a world, where nature have lost her mind and repelled the civilisation. Use cold steel and trustworthy rifles or guns to fight back.
